mapper.insert: insert into ph_board (title, writer, password, content, imgFile, thumbImg) values (#{title}, #{writer}, #{password}, #{content}, #{imgFile}, #{thumbImg})
mapper.update: update ph_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, imgFile= #{imgFile}, thumbImg= #{thumbImg} where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select:
select seq, title, content, writer, imgFile, regDate, hit, thumbImg from ph_board
order by regDate desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select count(seq) from ph_board where 1=1
and (title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or writer like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
